title: Exonerated: Part 2 # 944 (Ep 944)
description:
In this episode I address the complete, total evisceration of the entire collusion hoax and the complete vindication of the President of the United States. This is part two of a two part show. 
 
News Picks:
Devastating new FBI texts reveal that the Obama White House was involved in the Russiagate scandal. 
 
This Rowan Scarborough piece debunks the dossier point by point.
 
Jim Clapper has already implicated Barack Obama in the Russiagate scandal. Here’s the clip. 
 
Lindsey Graham rips into a reporter for an absurdly biased question. 
 
Desperate CNN reporters are still camped outside of Mueller’s office. 
 
Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
